sentences: Plamena Mangova (born in Pleven, 1980) is a Bulgarian pianist.
Plamena Mangova studied with Marina Kapatsinskaya at the State Music Academy in Sofia.
She went on to study with Dmitri Bashkirov at the Reina Sof√≠a School of Music in Madrid, and with Abdel Rahman El Bacha at the Queen Elisabeth Music Chapel.
Nine years later she took part at the XVI Queen Elisabeth International Music Competition, where she was second to Anna Vinnitskaya.
